pages.title: Welcome!
pages.text: Welcome to Essentials! Essentials is a mod by Technomancer about vanilla style automation- all of its features enhance or extend automation in a way that is simple, easy to understand, but also flexible.$(br2)This book should have all the information you need about

Essentials. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to join the $(l:https://discord.gg/6g47knp)Discord/$, and if you find any bugs, please report them either on the $(l:https://discord.gg/6g47knp)Discord/$ or $(l:https://github.com/Da-Technomancer/Essentials/)Github/$.$(br2)

Crossroads is another mod by the same developer- if Crossroads is installed, it will also be documented in this book. Crossroads is a much larger steampunk mod designed to have interesting, tricky, and rewarding automation. It also has a powerful lategame and is highly configurable.$(br2)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/crossroads-mc)Why not give it a try?/$$(br2)
